verses.verse: To <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, do I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
My <S%H430>God,<s%> I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H954>you.<s%> Don't let me be shamed. <S%H341>Don't<s%> let my enemies triumph over <S%H5970>me.<s%>
<S%H6960>Yes,<s%> no one who waits for you shall be <S%H954>shamed.<s%> They shall be <S%H954>shamed<s%> who deal <S%H898>treacherously<s%> without <S%H7387>cause.<s%>
<S%H3045>Show<s%> me your <S%H1870>ways,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3925>Teach<s%> me your <S%H734>paths.<s%>
<S%H1869>Guide<s%> me in your <S%H571>truth,<s%> and <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H430>me,<s%> For you are the God of my <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for you all day <S%H3117>long.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> your tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%> and your loving <S%H7356>kindness,<s%> for they are from old <S%H5769>times.<s%>

<S%H2142>Don't<s%> remember the <S%H2403>sins<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth,<s%> nor my <S%H6588>transgressions.<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> me according to your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for your <S%H2898>goodness<s%>' <S%H3068>sake,<s%> Yahweh.
<S%H2896>Good<s%> and <S%H3477>upright<s%> is <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> therefore he will <S%H3384>instruct<s%> <S%H2400>sinners<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
He will <S%H1869>guide<s%> the <S%H6035>humble<s%> in <S%H4941>justice.<s%> He will <S%H3925>teach<s%> the <S%H6035>humble<s%> his <S%H1870>way.<s%>
All the <S%H734>paths<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> are loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> to such as <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and his <S%H5713>testimonies.<s%>
For your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H3068>sake,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H5545>pardon<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> for it is <S%H7227>great.<s%>
What <S%H376>man<s%> is he who <S%H3373>fears<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> He shall <S%H3384>instruct<s%> him in the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he shall <S%H977>choose.<s%>
His <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H3885>dwell<s%> at <S%H2896>ease.<s%> His <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H5475>friendship<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is with those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H3045>him.<s%> He will show them his <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H8548>ever<s%> on <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he will <S%H3318>pluck<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> out of the <S%H7568>net.<s%>
<S%H6437>Turn<s%> to <S%H2603>me,<s%> and have mercy on <S%H3173>me,<s%> for I am desolate and <S%H6041>afflicted.<s%>
The <S%H6869>troubles<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> are <S%H7337>enlarged.<s%> Oh bring me <S%H3318>out<s%> of my <S%H4691>distresses.<s%>
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and my <S%H5999>travail.<s%> <S%H5375>Forgive<s%> all my <S%H2403>sins.<s%>
<S%H7200>Consider<s%> my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> for they are <S%H7231>many.<s%> They <S%H8130>hate<s%> me with <S%H2555>cruel<s%> <S%H8135>hatred.<s%>
Oh <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H954>me.<s%> Let me not be disappointed, for I take refuge in <S%H2620>you.<s%>
Let <S%H8537>integrity<s%> and <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> <S%H5341>preserve<s%> <S%H6960>me,<s%> for I wait for you.
<S%H6299>Redeem<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> out all of his <S%H6869>troubles.<s%>
